Total Estimated Costs:
Accommodations: $499 (2 nights) + $900 (3 nights) + $241 (2 nights) = $1,640
Transportation: $71 (ABQ to HOU) + $15 (HOU to SAT) + $22 (SAT to DAL) + $52 (DAL to ABQ) = $160
Food and Attractions: Estimated $200 per day for 2 people x 7 days = $1,400
Total: $1,640 (Accommodations) + $160 (Transportation) + $1,400 (Food/Attractions) = $3,200

Remaining Budget: $5,000 - $3,200 = $1,800

Note: The remaining budget can be used for additional meals, attractions, souvenirs, or any unforeseen expenses. Smoking accommodations were chosen based on the "house_rules" field allowing smoking. Private rooms and entire homes were selected to avoid shared accommodations. All activities and restaurants were chosen to ensure no repeats and to offer a diverse experience. Prices for meals and attractions are estimated averages and may vary.
